wikipedia_page.main: Noel Trigg (born 28 November 1933 - 29 October 2020) was a Welsh light heavyweight boxer. Based in Newport, Trigg's professional career spanned from 1952 to 1959 and he held the Welsh light heavyweight title from 1956 to 1958. Trigg is now involved in politics and was an independent councillor on Newport City Council and in the past has held the title of Mayor of Newport.
